document.full_text: a student accused of secretly playing the sexual tryst online of a roommate who later committed suicide pleaded not guilty on monday to hate crime charges in the case that drew national attention to issues of gay-bashing and bullying.
document.title: student implicated in rutgers suicide pleads not guilty
lines_and_colors: a student accused of secretly playing the sexual tryst online of a roommate who later committed suicide pleaded not guilty on monday to hate crime charges in the case that drew national attention to issues of gay-bashing and bullying.
